title: Subchapter A - DRIVER LICENSING AND TRAINING
content:
Subchapter A - DRIVER LICENSING AND TRAINING
State Regulations

Part 1 - Class Dj And Mj Drivers' Licenses (§ 1.1 to 1.6)

Part 2 - Driver Education In High Schools And Colleges (§ 2.1 to 2.8)

Part 3 - Drivers' Licenses (§ 3.1 to 3.12)

Part 4 - Learner's Permits (§ 4.1 to 4.6)

Part 5 - Vision Requirements And Periodic Vision Reexaminations (§ 5.1 to 5.10)

Part 6 - SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS FOR BUS DRIVERS
Part 7 - Prelicensing Classroom Driver Training And Highway Safety Instruction (§ 7.1 to 7.12)

Part 8 - ROAD AND WRITTEN TESTS, WAIVER AND EFFECT (§ 8.1 to 8.6)

Part 9 - Driver License Qualifications After Loss Of Consciousness (§ 9.1 to 9.6)

Part 10 - INTERNET PRE-LICENSING COURSE (§ 10.1 to 10.15)

Part 11 - Special Requirements for For-Hire Vehicle Motor Carriers (§ 11.1)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
